title: Special Issue "Cell Biology in Diabetes and Diabetic Complications".
abstract: Globally, diabetes mellitus represents a growing health challenge due to its metabolic dysregulation and the complex nature of its micro- and macrovascular complications such as diabetic kidney disease (DKD), diabetic retinopathy, cardiovascular disease and diabetic neuropathy [...].
clean_text: special issue cell biology in diabetes and diabetic complications globally diabetes mellitus represents a growing health challenge due to its metabolic dysregulation and the complex nature of its micro and macrovascular complications such as diabetic kidney disease dkd diabetic retinopathy cardiovascular disease and diabetic neuropathy
